name: Donkey Konga 2
description:
Donkey Konga 2 is a family game developed by NAMCO. It came out on 01-07-2004. Nintendo published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Donkey Konga 2 is available on GameCube.
Hiroshi Igarashi produced the game. Hiroyuki Onoda directed the game. Jesahm and Junko Ozawa scored the game.
